snippet.title: The History of Seneca 7
snippet.description:
Start to learn about the lore behind Seneca 7 the action adventure infused with RPG and Farming elements. Preorder now to unlock exclusive content in the game www.thesenecaproject.com!

Seneca 7 is an enchantingly cozy adventure RPG with farming, crafting and so much more! Enter the fantastic world of S7 and take on the missions of your settlement as everyone faces the looming threats to come. Experience the game however you want through real time class-based combat, exploration of an unknown alien world or getting to know the other settlers all in the hopes of establish a thriving settlement! Go for it solo or grab your buddy and help determine the fate of Seneca 7.

Discord: https://discord.gg/6dhdmduYE3
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1901860/Seneca_7_A_Cyberpunk_Odyssey/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/S7Cyberpunk
Press Kit: https://www.thesenecaproject.com/press
